website_summaries.verdict: This cervical pillow offers an innovative shape that supports your head and neck when sleeping on your back or side.
pros: Features a contoured design with indentation that supports the neck when side-sleeping
Polyfiber fill is a suitable choice for those who don't like memory foam
cons: No removable cover, but works with most standard pillow cases

customer_reviews.title: extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! I had a really bad pinched nerve and decided to get this pillow so I could sleep..and it worked perfectly! I truly believe it helped me heal. The best part is that if you roll to your side no need to fluff it, the sides high enough that I'm supported.
customer_reviews.author: jessenia26

customer_reviews.title: Only would recommend for a very specific size person with a particular sleep position
customer_reviews.text: I do not have cervical injury but do have occasional discomfort from sleeping on traditional pillows & wanted something that didn't induce a neck 'crank' while I slept. I'm primarily a side-sleeper. This pillow is ok but quite firm & over-filled. The indention is great but the gap between the indention for the head & the rounded pillow part from indention to where it touches the shoulder is rather large even for me (6'1"). If you sleep on your back & position your shoulders just right, it's a great pillow. If you are a side-sleeper like myself or I suspect if you have a shorter neck, this pillow would be a waste of your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is a life saver!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never slept better than I do now with my awesome cervical pillow. It can seem a little stiff at first, but it was an easy fix by sitting on it for a little while before going to bed that evening. It only took that one sitting. I can sleep comfortably on my back or sides and no longer wake up with neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette DuCasse

customer_reviews.title: Quick benefit
customer_reviews.text: While I have not had this pillow for a long time, I've had a significantly positive benefit already. The neck pain I've had and more importantly, the TMJ issues that have plagued me for several weeks are markedly improved (Full disclosure: I'm also wearing a home-made jaw stabilizer when I sleep, which has undoubtedly helped). The pillow is a nice balance between firm and soft. The 'neck bump' is neither too high or low for me. The wings are the right height for side sleeping, though I'm not currently doing a lot of that. My neck range of motion is dramatically improved after just a short time. If you're having neck issues, this might help you.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Smith

customer_reviews.title: SUPER PILLOW!
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed my daughter's Roscoe Medical Cervical Sleep Pillow one night and almost didn't give it back to her! My neck has never felt so good in a long, long time. Unfortunately, I've been in several car accidents where I was rear ended and my neck is pretty messed up. I've been to the chiropractor and that helps for a while, but now that I'm using this pillow every night (I bought one for myself) my neck is feeling really good. I don't have any morning stiffness or aches! This is a GREAT pillow. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Bixpo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for sitting up
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked using this pillow for when I am sitting up to help support my back and neck. I tried using it for sleep and it was not as comfortable for me personally but that is just one opinion. I had to post this hilarious picture of who took over the pillow by the next day. Hopefully, I can get it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: The pillow does seem set up weird. I bought it because it was $17 vs $40+. The material is more firm and the divet in the middle is too steep, but it has helped my neck feel better, but I have to lay on it a certain way to feel comfortable...it’s okay for price and what you get, but I would have rathered spent more money on something I know for sure I’d like. Funnily enough, after reading many reviews of this pillow, people would say their cats have claimed it and well, it really does make a good cat bed...
customer_reviews.author: A. Ranee

customer_reviews.title: Only made pinched nerves, neck, and back pain worse!
customer_reviews.text: I am a back sleeper because of the pain in my shoulders and neck; I have a bad neck with inflamed disc and pinched nerves and shoulder pain, finding a pillow is still an issue that doesn't make the pain worse. This one is way too firm for me. Within minutes my neck heated up and nerve pain shot all down my back and shoulders. I layed there longer trying to give it a chance, but the pain got worse. I immediately returned this the next day. If you have any neck, shoulder, or back issues I would not suggest this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Efren Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillow
customer_reviews.text: Spent hundreds of dollars on a neurologist, MRI, and lots of medication to fix my morning migraines. All I needed was this pillow. Since using this pillow I have not had a single morning headache/migraine. I have been using this pillow for a couple months, I'm so sad I didn't know about it sooner. It can be very difficult to get used to but once you get the hang of it, it's great. I have since purchased one for my husband and he also loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: A Win In My Book
customer_reviews.text: I have occipital neuralgia, chronic pain and get intense neck/head spasms. I needed something to cradle and my head while supporting my neck. This pillow does the job. It helps reduce tension in my neck and keeps my head at a good angle when I am resting. I have noticed less intense neck pain and spasms. The pillow is very firm and not very forgiving in any position other than laying on your back. That can be frustrating if you're like me and struggle to find a comfortable position to sleep in. The fact it helps reduce my pain and discomfort is a win in my book. It's been a good replacement for my older cranial-cervical support pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kalee Jackson

customer_reviews.title: My cat stole my pillow
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice cat bed apparently. My cat will not let me sleep on it, she thinks I bought it for her. It seems nice and every once in a while I can try it and it feels supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: my pillow for life!
customer_reviews.text: For over 50 yrs I've lived @ the Chiropractor due to neck pain. It seems that the junction @ base of my head & head cannot find an angle to lay on that is comfortable. When I got this pillow (because of the rounded edges) the first night was horrible. I decide to send it back like every other pillow I've tried. But a little voice inside told me "one more night". Well, last night -2nd Night- was The BEST sleep, the longest w/o getting-up for pee breaks, the most mild sweet dreams, and when I arose I had NO headache and happier than a clown. This is my pillow for life!!! Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, no more pain
customer_reviews.text: We've been told about various other pillows and how great they are but we went with this one because of the price and my wife says it definitely works. She'd been feeling tense at her neck and would always complain about the pain. Now pain is gone. Pillow is very firm on the sides. Pros: Cheap compared to others on here Does the same function Cons: It does take getting used to but don't give up, you'll find the best way to position your head If you are a cuddler, this type of pillow in general makes it more difficult to cuddle because of the bully sides.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Worst feeling pillow i have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I thought i would give this pillow a try since i was having neck pain at night and hoped this would help resolve it but i couldn't even stand it for a minute. It is basically weird the way your head sinks into a hole in the middle of the pillow and caused me more neck pain from the strain of my head leaning over the edge of this pillow with the center of my head falling into a hole. Is this some form of a torture device? I personally would not recommend it for neck pain problems.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Like a Karate Chop to the Back of the Neck
customer_reviews.text: There is so much unyielding polyester fill around the deep hole in the center of the pillow that I can't imagine anybody with a normal head/neck/back configuration finding this a satisfactory solution to sleeping difficulties caused by the pillows they are currently using. The huge amount of improperly placed fill causes the neck to bend in a very awkward and untenable position while throwing the head backwards and deep into the pillows central abyss. This is being sent back after a few nights of testing.
customer_reviews.author: PinL

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed that such a small change in nightly posture has ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a cervical neck injury ten years ago and have problems with neck spasm. Nothing has really worked except deep massage and muscle relaxers --- until I got this pillow. I'm amazed that such a small change in nightly posture has made such a huge difference. After using it for 3 days the muscle spasm is starting to fade. It's not completely gone, but I'd say a 50% reduction so far. What an excellent product for a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Button

customer_reviews.title: Where Have You Been All My Life?
customer_reviews.text: Here I was thinking that I needed a new mattress first and hated going to bed when all I needed was this pillow!!! It has two sides but the lower side supports my neck and shoulders more comfortably. The head indentation allows my head to extend back comfortably which I like, and not push it forward which inhibits my breathing. I slept all the way through the night for the first time in months, and woke up with NO neck pain! Is this what it's supposed to be like in the mornings??? Count me IN!
customer_reviews.author: TehillahGem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for whiplash injury
customer_reviews.text: I sustained a major whiplash injury 3 years ago and waking up every morning with neck pain has been a fact of life since. After trying many very expensive pillows, I found this pillow. In my search I realized I needed support under my neck, and not under my head. I realized I also hate memory foam. The concept of this pillow with the indention where your head goes appealed to me, it isn't memory foam and it was very reasonably priced. It took maybe 3 days to adapt to a flatter, firmer pillow, but I love it. I wake up pain free most days now. I'm a side sleeper and back sleeper and this pillow is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gr8typist

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is FABULOUS!!
customer_reviews.text: As a side sleeper for most of my life, I've spent an unholy amount of money on pillows that just couldn't maintain their shape for long. I bought this Roscoe about 3 months ago and I LOVE it!! The firmness took a little getting used to, but once I got used to it, I realized a mini-miracle...no more waking up in a wet spot of drool! Because the corners are firm enough to support my cheek in a level position, unlike the downward slant of other pillows, I almost never drool anymore. That alone would be worth the price! I highly recommend this pillow to any side sleeper!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Currin

customer_reviews.title: Too hard and thick for back sleepers.  Forces head to pitch forward.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow so that I could teach myself to be a back sleeper (side sleeping has given me pain in shoulder and hips). This is not working for me. Very hard and the part that is supposed to go under your neck is too thick an too wide making my head pitch forward and the back of my head doesn't even touch the pocket in the middle. I suppose the fiber fill will break down eventually, but I don't want to have to wait til the pillow fails to have a good night's sleep. I wouldn't recommend this one. BOUGHT A BUCKWHEAT PILLOW and I am now very, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: KGinOregon

customer_reviews.title: King Henry recommends
customer_reviews.text: Ugh I’m pretty sure this is a bed for a small dog. I kept thinking I could let air out of it as it is so hard and more like putting your head on a chopping block. Well my small rescue dog will enjoy her new Princess Pad and I’m headed to another box store in town so I can sleep tonight without fear of King Henry coming for my head in my dreams
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Made for a man, not a woman
customer_reviews.text: This product could be very helpful, but it is sized for a man's head and neck, not a woman's. This pillow was recommended to me by my chiropractor for chronic neck pain. I could see how it would be helpful if you were a large man or woman, but it is not proportioned for a smaller person. It threw off my alignment and my head was always at a strange angle. I woke up with more pain than before. If you are taller, bigger, or with a long neck, it may work for you, but if you are petite - forget about it. Also, it is very, very hard, so be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst

customer_reviews.title: I'm super crafty and used to sew professionally so I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Rock hard, weird space to the dip in the middle. I'm 5'7" and recovering from 2 level discectomy and fusion. This as the most awful thing I've ever put my head on. Had husband try, he is 6' 3", he couldn't stand it either. I'm super crafty and used to sew professionally so I thought I could adjust to the firmness I wanted when I got it, but this thing was beyond redemption. There is nothing I could have done to make this work in any way. The fiberfill inside is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Orion's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Bought this “Just in the Neck of Time”
customer_reviews.text: I’ve invested quite a bit in pillows (they can get quite pricey) over the last 2.5 yrs- trying to find one that actually worked for me. So far this one has been wonderful! Only a few days & I can tell the difference. I have no problem sleeping on my side either (unlike other reviews). I would not have considered this type of pillow(with the cut out center), however my chiropractor was selling one similar in his office (marked up). This is great value...and has been a huge blessing! 🙏🏻🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Robin M

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t sleep! Increased pain :(
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’d give this pillow a chance as I have had neck problems. The first night I couldn’t sleep and was miserable and I told myself I’d give it a few more days since the pillow may be repositioning my neck into a correct place - which could be uncomfortable. However, I tried it for almost a week and had difficulty sleeping, increased neck pain, as well as jaw discomfort and migraines. I think the pillow affects everyone very differently but redirect didn’t help me.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Helped Resolve Shoulder Pain and Recommend with Caveats
customer_reviews.text: This helped to resolve a shoulder pain I had been having that would last for a long time and come back periodically. I rarely get the pain now and if I do, it is much less and doesn't go on and on like it did before. My pillow is unevenly stuffed. One side is a bit firmer than the other. I rotate it every night to try to get even sleeping on it. It is not amazing, but it is good enough that I continue to use it for months. I would recommend it at this price point to give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Me
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow so much! It is exactly what I needed. I can see where it is not the perfect pillow for everyone, but if you are normally arranging pillows into this sort of shape to sleep, as I was, you owe it to yourself to at least try it. Yes it is firm. Is it a little too firm? Sometimes. But I can always adjust to the right spot. Even where sometimes I sleep with my head partially on the side or my arm on the side. And! My arms aren't falling asleep at night anymore which I'm super grateful for.
customer_reviews.author: redroxx

customer_reviews.title: Great cat bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to try to help my migraines. Unfortunately, it didn't have the desired effect. But, like some of the other reviewers, my cats have gladly adopted this pillow. I have to buy another one because they fight over it! In the picture, my black and white cat is trying to be sneaky about getting "his" pillow back.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order for this product. I have multiple generating discs in the base of my neck and would commonly wake up with pinched nerves in my neck. Since I've been using this pillow (about a year) it hasn't happened a single time. My partner was recently in a car accident and suffered a beck injury. I recommended this pillow to them and ordered a second one. They are also having great results. The design takes some getting used to but the results speak for themselves. Note this product was recommended by my orthopedic surgeon. If you have a neck injury, consult a doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna A

customer_reviews.title: Concept is nice. The middle part
customer_reviews.text: Concept is nice. The middle part, where your neck rests, kind of deforms. The stuffing gets moved around and you'll never get it back as you want it. At least in mine it did, on both sides, within a few weeks. Unfortunate because the first few nights were nice. Going to give their "D" version a try to see if maybe its design will last longer/better. If not, I'll be using my Neckbone pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow once adjusted
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews have mentioned, this pillow is way too firm. I opened it up & removed some filling to meet my comfort level. With that adjustment, I am very happy with the pillow. I have used it for 3 nights and have felt very supported. I haven't woken up with neck pain. I am tossing & turning less because my head & neck are properly cushioned. It looses a star because it needs adjusting. If you know how to open a seam, remove stuffing evenly, & sew a seam shut; I'd recommend this pillow. It's price makes it worth the effort to adjust it yourself
customer_reviews.author: unsinkmbrown

customer_reviews.title: Okay for back sleepers
customer_reviews.text: It supported my neck & the center cradled the back of my head, but my snoring increased while sleeping on my back. I found it uncomfortable while sleeping on my side. The Roscoe Cervical Pillow border caused my jaw to be misaligned. I couldn't close my mouth. It may work for some, but not for me. I'm glad it was less expensive than some of the others. Hopefully I'll find a way to repurpose it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable pillow, I was very disappointed. It is much too firm and hard and the center is to hollow wall the edges are two overstuffed. It raises my neck up and does not leave my head in a comfortable position. I was really hoping to buy a good pillow to help my back and spine but this was not it. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Seher Raza

customer_reviews.title: This Pillow is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This Pillow is a life saver. After a spinal fusion in my neck I was in so much pain. I couldn't sleep because i was hurting so bad. this pillow is the answer. now it does take time to get used to it. I alternated it with my old pillow but it didn't take long before I threw the old pillow away. Now I sleep through the night and better yet I wake up pain free. it's not just my neck but my whole spine. I look forward to going to bed Just so I find some relief from the pain I am in all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Behrends

customer_reviews.title: Worst Pillow Ever
customer_reviews.text: If you are a small person and you put your ear on the depression in the pillow, you feel like you are choking on the high ridge on the bottom and cannot breathe because of the high ridge on the side. I would return it but I threw the box away. No charity will take pillows, even unused, so into the landfill it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Andreatf

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price fool you
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this pillow would be any good, especially given its low price. I've got a ton of other pillows, ranging from specialty cervical pillows to memory foam ones to hybrid down/polyester ones and this one has become my favorite...and it's also the cheapest one I've got! True, it doesn't have the responsiveness of foam, the warmth and sinking softness of down or the amazing warranty of other brands, but you could replace this one several times over - if needed - for its low price. As a back sleeper, this pillow works great for me to keep my head in place.
customer_reviews.author: RTSea15

customer_reviews.title: A lot of padding
customer_reviews.text: I get a cervical pillow that looks a lot like this from my chiropractor. I decided to try this one due to the price but it has A LOT of padding inside. When I first used it, my neck hurt for a week. I was unable to workout and move my neck much. I was in so much pain bc it clearly was too thick for me. HOWEVER, my husband tried it and loves it. He has broader shoulders than I do and I guess it suits his neck better. I suppose it's not for everyone but if it works for you, it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantis

customer_reviews.title: Good shape; bad filling.
customer_reviews.text: For $17, this is cheaper than many other cervical pillows, and with good reason. It’s dense polyester fill; while the shape of the pillow is nice particularly for a back sleeper, the filling starts to feel hard after about ten minutes. Side sleeping isn’t an option, it’s too densely-packed. This might be a good short-solution for neck pain, but it’s just not a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: forest fox

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews before buying this pillow. I have constant neck pain and headaches. I was so excited to try this and get some relief. It was too hard and not comfortable to me. I have put it away and got back out to retry several times.I wish that people would write honest reviews . I really rely on them before I buy products. I never tried to return pillow, so I can't say if company would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: sandy h

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price, i'm sleeping better.
customer_reviews.text: i like this pillow because so far i have been sleeping a little better, but time will tell if this will hold up. the sides are pretty sturdy although it has creased in some areas so it may have needed some more padding. in the center, there is nothing there but a flat piece of material, i thought there would be some cushioning, at least lightly but nada. it is a standard size pillow, my pillowcase fits on it just fine. for the price this seems ok. i will update in a few months before i recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is so comfortable and eases the pain I suffer in my neck so much. it is perfect. I use a cpap and was finding it difficult to use an other pillows, I bought on for cpap users and it was as soft as a rock, I am glad I found this one. From night one I fell asleep and stayed asleep through the night. I am considering buying one for my son in law whom also uses a cpap.
customer_reviews.author: normaporter

customer_reviews.title: Huge pillow not for a 5'3 female, wont fit small neck
customer_reviews.text: Waste of my money because it's so hard it won't smush and the neck part is too big for my female neck maybe a big guy will fit the curve... it just pushes my head up because my head can't make it to the center so I never use it and I can't return it because I had to use it for a week before I gave up. I just use my 3 dollar Walmart pillow.
customer_reviews.author: NailedbyNikkiLash

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: I've had neck pain for several decades, and have tried several, often very expensive, pillows. This one is a little awkward to get accustomed to, but it's making a huge difference in my neck alignment and comfort. My Chiropractor sold me the first one, then I bought the same one on Amazon because I travel frequently. I'll never use another pillow if I can possibly help it. BTW, it was not necessary to remove any of the filling - I need the firm support.
customer_reviews.author: mstisme

customer_reviews.title: Well made but quite stiff
customer_reviews.text: This pillow.is made from great material and is very well constructed, however, it is not very comfortable. It is semi-hard and quite stiff. When I first laid on it, it felt great for the first 10 min, afterwhich, I started to feel pain and much discomfort in my lower back and neck. I will keep it cause my toddler loves to curl up in it but it did not satisfy my pain relief needs.
customer_reviews.author: LeKeisha Cotten

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to spend entire night sleeping on this pillow after few months of use. Hole in the middle is too small (ears hurting from being pressed), uneven filled sides of the pillow causing head to slip and slide forcing you to sleep in only one position, on your back. Don't waste your $ on this one ... I believe there are better solutions out there.
customer_reviews.author: IS011

customer_reviews.title: Great, Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this kind of pillow for several years. I moved and apparently my pillow did not come with me. I have severe neck and upper shoulder pain. I received this pillow when it was scheduled to be delivered. My first night sleeping on it, it was great. I did not wake up with severe pain, as I usually do. I am 75 years old, and it is very hard to find items that help relieve your pain. I am going to order me another one , as a spare. I would recommend this pillow to any person that has neck and upper shoulder problems.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great cat bed
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I bought this because my cat was stealing my nicer one, and I was tired of it. This was cheap, and I figured it would cost less than an actual cat bed. So far, she loves it. What can I say, it performs exactly as hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Oveta

customer_reviews.title: Just an Ok pillow
customer_reviews.text: The pillow has potential. It's just a little too firm and filled for my comfort. If it was a little flatter, I may have felt more comfortable. It's a good design though. When I lay on my back, I do feel the support on my neck, and it gives me a good stretch. And when I turn on my side, it seems to support my head so that my neck doesn't feel too bent. I just wish it was softer.
customer_reviews.author: F. H. Legaspi III

customer_reviews.title: No more tossing and turning.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd order for this pillow. The first significantly reduced my nighttime neck and back pain. I’ve tried half a dozen different pillows over the past year and this one was by far the best. The contoured memory foam pillow was okay but too thin. I alway had to stuff a towel in the pillowcase under the pillow to make it thr right height. With the Roscoe Cervical Pillow no more tossing, turning and smashing the pillow in to a shape that fits my head and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: ... because it is made well and the packaging was good also. As far as the comfort
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it two stars because it is made well and the packaging was good also. As far as the comfort, for me it is awful. I tried it for a week to help with my cervical herniated discs and could not sleep without pain. It caused more harm than good for me. The padding is very thick for my neck which added pressure by overflexing while sleeping. It is quite firm and does not mold to adjust to the arch of your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Marty

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but not comfy.
customer_reviews.text: After Googling how to alleviate the sinus headaches I get right before I sleep, many advisors pointed to neck pillows instead of my regular fluffy pillow. Even before I fell asleep on the first night with the new pillow, my headache was cured! It supported just the right amount to alleviate the sinus headaches. Downside: I hate sleeping on it. It's so uncomfortable, only because I love my soft, unsupportive (bad for me) pillow. So really, I only bring this neck pillow out for an effective rescue mission on my head and neck. So, overall effective and definitely does what is promised.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Vanlandingham

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife when she started complaining about severe neck/back pains every morning. First 3 days she was quite uncomfortable using this as your head goes down in the recess. But she could feel the difference 2nd day onwards, and now after approximately a month of use, she finds this quite necessary. I tried this pilot once but didn't feel quite comfortable, may be this is only for people with neck/back pains , or this is a placebo effect. The product quality is quite good, but its better if you use it with a pillow cover, as the white color gets stained very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: No more stiff necks!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! I recently ordered my second pillow so I can use it at my son’s house. It supports my neck while allowing my head to fit naturally below the neck. I never wake up with a stiff neck or headache. When I first tried it, the pillow felt strange. However, after sleeping on it I was amazed. It’s created to support head and shoulders naturally. I use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Sean B.

customer_reviews.title: I normally sleep on my back without moving during the ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally sleep on my back without moving during the night, but I found myself starting to toss and turn. My old pillow was only a month or two old, but it wasn't giving me the proper support I needed. After ordering this product, I instantly started sleeping well again, and the tossing and turning completely stopped. I wasn't expecting much for the cheap price of this pillow, but it is much nicer than I thought it would be, and I'm not sure I can do back to a non-cervical support pillow.
customer_reviews.author: R. Frances

customer_reviews.title: I believe this pillow was meant to be a foam roller instead
customer_reviews.text: Big head/big guy so thought this little egg nest was a sweet invention. But like most, you either love it or hate it. It's so hard that it felt like sleeping on a hard foam roller. Needs to use a different material and way less of it or make it adjustable. Bottom line, it's exactly what you get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Firm pillow but great support!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this pillow for 2 weeks. Great support and pain relief pillow. I can lay on my back using it to alleviate pain for about 20 min. However, I still find it a bit hard sleeping on my back, but maybe with time it will be easier. This is a very firm pillow so I am waiting for it to get softer.
customer_reviews.author: Bizzy Family

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is horrible! Cheap dollar store pillows are better than this one!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow sucks! I have had it and used it for a few months now and I am giving up on it. I think it actually made my sleeping pattern worse! They are awkward and stiff, the padding is horrible and it never did break in and listen up any. It's like sleeping with a log under my neck. This pillow is not for side sleepers....back sleepers...or any other position. I wouldn't recommend this pillow to my worst enemy!
customer_reviews.author: its me

customer_reviews.title: Possible vertigo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for occasional neck pain and used it about 4 days. Initially I thought it was good, a little stiff but good neck support. Last night I got up in the middle of the night and almost fell over from vertigo. Now I am super healthy and take no meds at all. I really feel it may have done something to my inner ear equilibrium. Needless to say, I'm very disappointed and my husband is not very eager to continue to use his pillow.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very firm
customer_reviews.text: If you need a pillow for firm cervical support, this is perfect. It doesn't work for my needs which is shielding my ear from the pillow surface. I have an ear with an issue on the top edge which has caused a pressure area which I was attempting to facilitate. My neck is evidently too short as my ear would have rested right on the raised area. Otherwise, this pillow is high quality and would be great for a cervical issue with a person with longer neck...
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Lane

customer_reviews.title: Get this pillow!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pillow a week and my neck already feels better! One side of it is firmer and the other side is softer. It loses a star because the softer side lost it's shape a bit after using it for a week. It turned the pillow and I'm hoping the softer side will regain it's shape. I will post an update in a month or so. June, 2018: It didn't lose it's shape! I'm still using it years later, and my neck feels fantastic! I just changed my review from 4 stars to 5 stars. I actually bought a second pillow to have for traveling and as a back-up.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear26Cubs

customer_reviews.title: Finally a pillow that works for me !
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with chronic neck pain and pasture issues and have tried more pillows that you can count but this one finally works. it provides good support to my neck and keeps my head in a natural position.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Loly

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders on neck pain!
customer_reviews.text: After two nights of sleeping with this pillow, I honestly already feel a difference in the soreness and stiffness of my neck and shoulders. The first night was fitful, because I wasn't used to sleeping like that. But I could tell the minute I got up the next morning that my neck was less tight and was hurting much less! It may just be a placebo effect, but either way, I plan to keep using this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has outperformed much more expensive and high-tech pillows with memory foam and ear holes. The price is right! I have neck pain from and this is the only pillow I can currently tolerate. Not perfect but I'm still looking for something better and have yet to find it.
customer_reviews.author: SharpDressedMan

customer_reviews.title: Firm pillow is too firm
customer_reviews.text: The firm pillow is really firm. It did not fit under my neck correctly and was so firm it put pressure on my neck causing my neck pain to be worse.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Will never use another
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pillow. Was Leary but now I can't sleep on anything else. Tried th neck roll ones and they are not comfortable. I have been sleeping with a very soft pillow and this one is firm and so much better. Don't let the firmness feature you detour you, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Goldentree

customer_reviews.title: Neck problem - this is your solution
customer_reviews.text: I have bought quite a few pillows for my neck issues. I exercise my neck and go to a chiropractor ... but really wanted a pillow to facilitate my sleeping ... this is the best pillow as it supports your neck but allows your head to be a tad lower for correct posture when sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: JT Philly

customer_reviews.title: IVE BEEN SEARCHING FOR THIS PILLOW MY WHOLE LIFE.
customer_reviews.text: This is the pillow I’ve been searching for all my life. Im a side sleeper and use Cpap. It was perfect the first night and perfect every minute since. Im frugal and broke but I’m going to buy another in case I need it. This pillow is perfect for a side sleeper. Oh the wonderful relief. It’s marvelous
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for arthritis!
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with severe arthritis in my neck & stay in constant pain. This pillow is a life saver to me. I get relief as soon as I lay down on it. I am able to sleep through the night for the most part & wake up able to move my neck. It is very firm at first but after the first night you get used to it. I will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: wendy bates

customer_reviews.title: Neck is better and so is my sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very firm but also very effective. Due to neck problems I've used this type of pillow for quite some time. However, they have always been made of foam. It took a little while to get used to the firmness of the pillow but my neck has improved. I'm also sleeping better. Yay! My Doctor is quite happy about this too. : )
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Too soft and squishy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Too soft and squishy. Core products stopped making the really super firm one so I was hoping this would work out but it didn't. :( Now I lay it flat on my bed and my kitty loves to nestle in the middle and sleep. lol....great cat bed.
customer_reviews.author: Karla's honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Finally a pillow that helps!
customer_reviews.text: I injured my neck years ago and can never find a comfortable pillow. Finally, I came across this one and it has helped so much! This week ai have not woke up in pain like usual. This pillow is VERY firm and works best for sleeping on your back but is also comfortable for you side.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for 2 nights. Too firm, & the distance on the "small" side from the edge to the center hollow was too long so that my head never really made it to the hollow. The small height needs to be coupled with a shorter distance ( for a shorter neck). Gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: JudyinAZ

customer_reviews.title: good for the neck
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic neck pain. I am a side sleeper for most part. I recently ordered this pillow. initial impressions: it is very firm on all sides but I was able to compress the side that goes under my neck when sleeping on my back. the two sides that I use when sleeping on the side, are still very firm but I'm hoping they will loosen a little with time. but yes this pillow does help with neck pain. I just dont know why they have to make it so firm and why there is no way to remove some of the filling without removing the stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Kool_am

customer_reviews.title: She tried them a few days and each time she woke with a headache and terrible neck stiffness
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sister that has cervical issue's, (surgery) neck pain, and fibromyalgia. She tried them a few days and each time she woke with a headache and terrible neck stiffness. The pillow has no give, you can't mold it to your head or neck, over-filled. The indented middle for head, sits too low, which she said was very uncomfortable. Not sure they are right for injured necks. At least it wasn't for my sister. Still waiting for refund
customer_reviews.author: MissSherry

customer_reviews.title: Much much better than a bamboo
customer_reviews.text: My final solution after numerous buy and returns. I use this as my base pillow and use another $3.97 pillow from Walmart and it solved my whiplash sleep problem. Much much better than a bamboo, foam or buckwheat pillow.
customer_reviews.author: meepMeep

customer_reviews.title: This pillow does help my situation!
customer_reviews.text: I had been waken up by the numbness feeling over my fingers during sleep. After hearing about a D core pillow, I had made purchases over it. The other one that I had used, which is smaller, did not help my situation but getting worse. But, this one, it looks HUGE. But, it does help!! I am so glad I had made such a purchase. Really happy about this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Pei-yi Lin

customer_reviews.title: ... could sleep on it all night but now i love it. I sleep much better with this
customer_reviews.text: It took me two days before i could sleep on it all night but now i love it. I sleep much better with this. Also i was having some shoulder pain that i suspected was do to my neck being in poor alignment. I stopped having that. Pain within a few days of sleeping on this pillow. It's a great cervical pillow for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the neck!!
customer_reviews.text: No!!!!!! More like heck no!!!! I tossed and turned all night. I even needed to go visit my chiropractor this morning for an adjustment!! She asked me what happened??? I told her-she said let the dog sleep on it!!! So, I will!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Tiner

customer_reviews.title: this was bad. The one side was softer than the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this was bad. The one side was softer than the other - not sure if that was how it was suppose to be. Think of it as one of those stiff pillows you would put on a wooden dining chair! And, my neck must be short because my head didn't "sit" in the hole. I tried it for a couple nights and it was horrible. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Not just for your head.
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased 4 of these to use as beds for my cats. They are sturdier, last longer and my cats prefer them to the pet beds they had. I also purchased some inexpensive pillowcases to cover them with and change them out weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Elle C

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is great to get a creak out of your neck with ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great to get a creak out of your neck with it just to kinda lay on for a bit. But, actually sleeping on it is a joke.. unless I just have a small head. My boyfriend got the laugh of the century when he saw me trying to sleep on it! Only because, my head couldn’t be seen! Like you’re in the pillow and become one with it when you’re resting your head on it! Sounds like it would be awesome if you enjoy no face room! I like to have a clearance to breathe! But, it’s definitely okay for a nap.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: to try this pillow and it's great! Stays cool and comfortable to sleep on and ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to have to sleep with a rolled up towel under my neck and it would get unrolled in the middle of the night and flatten out. I decided, after the towel wasn't doing it anymore for my neck pain, to try this pillow and it's great! Stays cool and comfortable to sleep on and I haven't woken up in the morning with neck pain since I started using it! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow definitely takes some getting used to but once I acclimated to it my neck and shoulder pain were mostly gone. Deducted one star because it's so specialized and for the adjustment period. I can attest it makes a great cat bed, too - if I leave it uncovered it's quickly occupied.
customer_reviews.author: jazzfan

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like at first , but had to use after a surgery, now I love it, I will never use another straight pillow. Awesome for your face to keep wrinkles away... will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Geeg

customer_reviews.title: Good for sore neck & tension headaches.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad of you like a firm pillow. I was looking for something a bit softer. Good for a quick lay down to release neck pain. I don't use it for sleeping but use it when I have a headache and need to lay down. Good for relief of tension headaches.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Helped with neck issues
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have neck issues and must learn to sleep on your back.Being a tummy sleeper it was a bit of an adjustment, but it does help. Only problem I had was convincing my smaller sleeping partner, puppy, that it was for me. He isn't truly convinced yet...I may have to buy him his very own .
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleepers that don't move in their sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic migraines and thought this would be a great fix. Unfortunately, I wake up with jaw pain from the contour of the pillow going up where my jaw meets it. I cosleep with a newborn so I move a lot to nurse throughout the night and this just hasn't been practical. Hopefully my husband can make good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: MarkHeather

customer_reviews.title: Neck pain be gone!
customer_reviews.text: For like a month straight I had the worst neck pain ever. I couldn’t move my head to the right or the left without cringing. So I thought this would help out a bit, and it sure did. Although I must admit, at first I hated it. It was too stiff for me, but within the 2nd and 3rd day it had adjusted to my head and I woke up feeling so much better. I can’t sleep without it now. I even take it with me when I travel. Definitely recommend if you’re a side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Misskeyna1

customer_reviews.title: Potential
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, and yes, it has helped me greatly. It's pretty firm, which is good for myself. It's taking a little getting used to and about 3 days to break it in. I'd be interested to see how the slightly higher priced versions feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a similar brand / style cervical pillow for years. What I like about this manufacturer is that it has more fill and is firmer which supports the neck when lying on my back and again when on my side. Its also helpful with less shoulder pain when lying on my side (I have larger shoulders). I know other think its to full or stiff (maybe they would like a Core pillow instead). But this one is perfect for me. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: KATE

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: So, I’ve been having neck pain on and off that refers pain to my shoulder! This pillow is a God send! I’m still having periodic discomfort but nothing like it was! I’m a side sleeper and the neck support is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but apparently I snore with it...
customer_reviews.text: I've had a tight neck and shoulders with TMJ issues for over 1.5 years now. This pillow feels AMAZING. I wake up without the crunchy neck and my back feels much better all the way down with this pillow. Unfortunately my wife says I snore loudly when sleeping on my back with this pillow. And she wants to destroy it! I doubt this is the case for most other people. I'll be buying one of these for my Mom, who also has neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent neck support
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that this has stopped or reduced my snoring, but I do know that this offers excellent neck support. I am both a side and back sleeper, and this works well for both. I rarely sleep through the night, but with this pillow, I have been able to more often. I also don't wake up sore. This is the best price I could find for this type of pillow, and I intend to order some more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M

customer_reviews.title: Roscoe Medical Cervical Indentation sleep pillow is okay for the price but would recommend something a bit bigger
customer_reviews.text: Roscoe Medical Cervical Indentation sleep pillow seems a bit small for my head to fit in the middle naturally and it gave me a bit of a neck ache. With all pillows it takes time to adjust to them and how your weight shapes them somewhat. I think that I'm used to a larger size and that product also took quite awhile to use for more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very firm. Provides great support.
customer_reviews.text: Have tried numerous pillows since a recent neck surgery. This is much firmer than expected, which is great for keeping my spine/neck aligned properly. Due to its firmness, it does take some getting used to as most cervical pillows I've used are soft...too soft, in fact. This is like no other pillow I've ever used, but once I got passed the initial difference I've loved it
customer_reviews.author: TillyFlotz

customer_reviews.title: OK but for one thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow but it does have a very thick stiff seam in the material running along the perimeter of the outside that can be felt even through a pillow case, and leaves a mark across the back of your neck. Maybe I'm just not lying on it correctly? Otherwise it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Cheyne

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many pillows to provide upper back support and this one is one of the best I’ve found as far as price and waking with decreased back/shoulder pain. It’s probably one of my favorite pillows I’ve used! It’s comfortable to use when sleeping on my back, and side.
customer_reviews.author: walden

customer_reviews.title: Still getting used to it since I initially found the ...
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to it since I initially found the center to be too indented. however, as I am using it, I do find that I awake with less neck pain more regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Verrrry uncomfortable! I could not get my head into any sort of supportive position as I needed lift to my neck which is what I needed at the time. Instead, my head “fell into” the indented middle section, putting more strain on my neck. I don’t understand the glowing reviews; it looks great in the picture but the physics of the design seems to come up short.
customer_reviews.author: Dog lady

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: I have had a dramatic decrease in headaches upon waking up since I bought this product. I sleep now with out pain!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

product_meta.title: Roscoe Cervical Pillow and Neck Pillow For Sleeping - Indented Contour Pillow for Sleeping on Back or Side - 16" x 23", Firm
product_meta.description:
Item #:PP3113 16 Fiber Filled Cervical Indentation Pillow You must be logged in to order this item. Log in here Our fiber-filled Cervical Indentation Sleep Pillow gently supports the head and neck during sleep to help remedy many common ailments, including tension headaches, neck spasms, arthritis, whiplash, post-spinal surgery and snoring. Its unique recessed core provides proper cervical support when sleeping on your back or side which helps improve the bodyÃƒ¢€™s rejuvenating process that occurs when one sleeps, providing a better feeling when they awake. High resiliency fiber springs back when compressed for exceptional comfort and durability. Blended cotton cover is breathable and soft to the touch. Fits a standard pillowcase. It holds its shape twice as long as average foam pillows 

Less tossing and turning with our recessed core head and neck pillow. Our fiber-filled cervical indentation sleep pillow gently supports the head and neck during sleep to help remedy many common ailments including tension headaches, neck spasms, arthritis, whiplash, post-spinal surgery and snoring.

Supports the neck to allow for proper alignment of the spine while sleeping. The neck pillow has a unique recessed core that provides proper cervical support when sleeping on your back or side which helps improve the body’s rejuvenating process that occurs when one sleeps, providing a better feeling when they awake, a perfect side sleeper pillow and neck support pillow.

High resiliency fiber in this cervical pillow springs back when compressed for exceptional comfort and durability. The blended cotton cover is breathable and soft to the touch. This cervical pillow fits a standard pillowcase 16" x 23".

Designed with a recessed core to support the head neck and shoulder while sleeping, these qualities make this pillow a great pillow for neck and shoulder pain, allowing for a good nights sleep. The contour pillow does not contain latex or neoprene. Home from a recent surgery or orthopedic neck procedure? Many professionals recommend this pillow as the perfect orthopedic pillow to ease pain until you can be fully recovered.



MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
8003767263
feature_bullets: NECK SUPPORT PILLOW: The cervical indentations in this pillow offers neck support for side sleepers and back sleepers. This versatile neck pillow for sleeping promotes a healthy sleeping posture, reducing discomfort.

FULL SUPPORT: An orthopedic pillow that doubles as a pillow for neck pain. Have back pain? This chiropractic pillow supports the head, neck, and shoulders to help you get a good nights rest, a perfect replacement for your normal sleep pillow.

PROMOTES HEALTHY POSTURE: Roscoe's therapeutic pillow provides comfortable, firm support to help you maintain proper positioning while sleeping or sitting. Correct cushioned, supported posture reduces pain and helps prevent pressure sores or ulcers.
GREAT FOR A SIDE SLEEPER OR BACK SLEEPER. The contour design of the pillow makes the pillow a great fit as a side sleeper pillow or pillow for back sleepers.

HELPS OTHER COMMON AILMENTS. Pillow is a cervical pillow for neck pain, but the pillow has also been used as a tmj pillow, shoulder pain pillow, or a medical pillow to help with tension headaches, whiplash, post-spinal surgery, and snoring.
